summary: Comprehensive testing of new OCR and Collaboration features completed. All tested features are working correctly: OCR Languages API, OCR Extract API, Searchable PDF creation, Collaboration Active Users API, Document Processor with OCR tab (NEW badge), and Visual Annotation Editor with collaboration status indicator (Live/Offline).

GET /api/ocr/languages.response: Returns available_languages dict, default language (eng), and note about additional languages

POST /api/ocr/extract.response: Returns ocr_id, file_id, status (completed), text, word_count, confidence, download_url, language
POST /api/ocr/extract.validation: Returns 404 for non-existent file_id, extracts text with 95%+ confidence

POST /api/ocr/searchable-pdf.response: Returns searchable_id, original_file, output_file, pages, download_url, status (completed)
POST /api/ocr/searchable-pdf.validation: Returns 404 for non-existent file_id, creates searchable PDF with text layer

WebSocket /ws/collaborate/{file_id}/{use.note: WebSocket endpoint implemented for real-time collaboration. Supports cursor_move, annotation_add/update/delete, selection, comment, and ping messages
